entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Waskaganish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:19 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High minus 21 with temperature falling to minus 32 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 21 with temperature falling to minus 32 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 46 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
